description:
Use this efficient solar panel to keep USB powered devices working while off the grid. Take lots of pictures, follow the GPS, shine lights and listen to podcasts, all without stressing about battery life.

  • SolarPanel 10 has two 5W monocrystalline panels that are ultra-slim allowing easy portability and set-up
  • 360 degree kickstand and sundial feature that ensures proper alignment and therefore maximum output
  • 3200mAh lithium-ion battery
  • IPX4 weather proofing
  • Lanyard tie points at each corner make it easy to attach to a pack, tent, or pannier
  • Micro USB female and type A USB female ports
  • 4-level charge indicator displays both the strength of the incoming sun and the internal battery’s capacity
name: BioLite Solar Panel 10+
